full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Elder Helper Services

## Notice Title:
[English]: Elder Helper Services
[French]: Services d’assistant de l’Aîné

## Contract Details:

*   Reference Number: PW-22-01011689
*   Solicitation Number: 50601-22-019
*   Publication Date: 2022-10-28
*   Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-14T15:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2023
*   Estimated Contract Value: $59,999.34 (GST/HST extra)

## Brief Background:
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for Elder Helper services to support the needs of Indigenous offenders in federal institutions. The selected supplier will provide services to ensure the accommodation of Indigenous spiritual and cultural practices and promote healing and balance.

## Key Requirements:

*   Provide Elder Helper services to Indigenous offenders
*   Assist Indigenous offenders in benefiting from traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions
*   Coordinate and provide supervision for traditional ceremonies
*   Conduct group discussions and teachings on ceremonial objects for offenders and staff
*   Provide counselling services to offenders
*   Assist staff in preparing reports and providing technical support for case management and parole processes

## Evaluation Criteria:
Suppliers must demonstrate their capabilities by submitting a statement of capabilities. The evaluation criteria include assisting and supporting Elders, providing counselling and guidance, conducting group discussions, and assisting in preparing reports (verbal and written).

## Additional Information:

*   This procurement is subject to the Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement
*   Interested suppliers must submit their statement of capabilities by November 14, 2022, at 2:00 PM CST
*   Contact information: Janet Nelson, Regional Procurement Officer, at (306) 659-9300 or 501contracts@csc-scc.gc

By submitting a statement of capabilities, suppliers can demonstrate their capabilities and increase their chances of being selected for the contract. The selected supplier will provide the services from January 1, 2023, to December 31, 2023. The estimated contract value is $59,999.34 (GST/HST extra).

This notice is a public announcement indicating the CSC intends to award the contract to a pre-selected supplier. The statement of capabilities must demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements. Solutions
